definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: A logger can have a name and be associated to a Level.
sentences.chinese: 记录器可以有一个名称并与某一级别相关联。

sentences.english: Outlines the steps required to create a single-processor logger.
sentences.chinese: 概述创建单处理器记录器所需的步骤。

sentences.english: It also gives you a nice logger.
sentences.chinese: 它还提供了一个很好的日志记录器。

sentences.english: Mechanize to prevent deletion and shut down of the logger.
sentences.chinese: 机械化，以防止删除和关闭的记录器。

sentences.english: This deposition system can be expected to be a new erasable picture recorder.
sentences.chinese: 该沉积系统可望作为一种新的可擦除图像记录器。

sentences.english: This logger is reserved for future use.
sentences.chinese: 此日志记录器保留以供将来使用。

sentences.english: Low-Cost Flight Data Recorder Reconstructs Attitudes From GPS.
sentences.chinese: 低成本飞行数据记录器从GPS重构飞行姿态。

sentences.english: Objective lens, optical pickup device, recorder and reproducer.
sentences.chinese: 物镜，光学拾取器，记录器和重现设备。

sentences.english: A method to make a temperature recorder with integrated sensor and IC card is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍用集成传感器和IC卡制作温度记录器的方法。

sentences.english: But it is understandable behavior from the recorder.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在记录器中，这是可以理解的行为。

sentences.english: It has enough energy to overcome the frictional resistance in valves and registers.
sentences.chinese: 它有足够的能量克服阀门和记录器的摩擦阻力。

sentences.english: First, the test recorder will initialize.
sentences.chinese: 首先，测试记录器将初始化。

sentences.english: VerbosityGets or sets the level of detail to show in the event log.
sentences.chinese: 登记所有建置事件的主控台记录器。

definition: transponder/electronic device that responds to a radio code
pinyin: yi4 pin2 lei2 da2 shou1 fa1 ji1

definition: transceiver/radio frequency receiver, broadcaster or relay
pinyin: wu2 xian4 dian4 shou1 fa1 ji1
